mapper.select: select i.id, i.name, i.avatar, i.participate_count, ipo.create_time as follow_time from edu_interest_follow ipo left join edu_interest i on ipo.interest_id = i.id where ipo.user_id = #{currentUserId} and i.status = 1 and i.delete_time is null order by ipo.create_time asc , i.participate_count desc
